message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a truly unique item, and I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $12000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $12000 might be a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this unique item.
